text: Hans-Christian Gabrielsen (27 July 1967 â€“ 9 March 2021) was a Norwegian industrial worker, politician, and trade unionist. He was elected leader of the Norwegian Confederation of Trade Unions in May 2017. Gabrielsen died suddenly in his sleep on 9 March 2021 from heart failure, aged 53.VG.no (Norwegian) ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Norwegian politicians Category:Trade unionists Category:Deaths from heart failure
